result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Darnell McIntosh Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $473.50 - 120 DTP.  2 days in RCJ for contempt if not paid.
Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

Defendant Michael Darnell McIntosh in court.  Brian Van Schyndel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.  Referred to SPD's office.  State rec:  150+cc.  Wants to proceed.
Court conducts colloquy w def re rights.  Def waives rights.

Defendant Michael Darnell McIntosh not in court.  Brian Van Schyndel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.  Def called stating he would be late or wants to reschedule.
BTC:  BW stayed 1 more week.  Status conference scheduled for December 29, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Michael Darnell McIntosh not in court.  Brian Van Schyndel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.  No appearance, Bench/Arrest Warrant requested/ordered, bond forfeited.

Pre-trial conference at 11-05-2015 03:15 pm.
Status conference at 12-07-2015 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:   ***ALSO $400.00 SIGNATURE BOND***   You have been ordered to have your fingerprints/photographs taken as a condition of your bond.  Report to the Sheriff's Office Records Bureau. Hours:  Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursday between 9:00 a.m. and 11:00 a.m. or between 1:00 p.m. and 4:00 p.m. It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Michael Darnell McIntosh in court.  Brian Van Schyndel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 5, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for December 7, 2015 at 08:30 am.
